question: Which Indian monument was lit on January 30, to observe the Neglected Tropical Diseases (NTD) Day?
explanation:
The second annual World Neglected Tropical Diseases (NTD) Day is observed on January 30, 2021. India is home to the worldâ€™s largest absolute burden of 11 of the major NTDs.
To celebrate the day, more than 50 landmarks representing 25 nations across the world will be lit up. India joins the celebration by lighting up the UNESCO world heritage site Qutub Minar, Delhi.
